item.title: PolitiTweet
item.description: PolitiTweet preserves the public record by archiving the tweets of major public figures and prominently displaying those that have been deleted. View the site at polititweet.org or read the source code on GitHub. Media Coverage Nightly News with Lester Holt: “Wide Range of Celebrities Accidentally Tweeted Russian Propaganda During 2016 Election” — “Famous Twitter users with big followers, from Ivanka Trump to comedians Trevor Noah and Sarah Silverman, inadvertently shared tweets that came from accounts linked to Russia, according to social media tracker PolitiTweet.
